I'm writing my review of LG 1.5-ton 3-star AC after using it for one month (In April which is not a peak hot time).

1. The cooling is very poor and inefficient. If you continue running the AC for more than 4 hours in Virat Mode, you won't be able to set the room temperature below 28 C.
2. Indoor unit size is small as compared to 1.5-ton ac of other brands so It doesn't circulate air in a wide area.

I'm writing my review of LG 1.5-ton 3-star AC after using it for one month (In April which is not a peak hot time).

2. Indoor unit size is small as compared to 1.5-ton ac of other brands so It doesn't circulate air in a wide area.

2. Indoor unit size is small as compared to 1.5-ton ac of other brands so It doesn't circulate air in a wide area.

I'm writing my review of LG 1.5-ton 3-star AC after using it for one month (In April which is not a peak hot time).

1. The cooling is very poor and inefficient. If you continue running the AC for more than 4 hours in Virat Mode, you won't be able to set the room temperature below 28 C.
2. Indoor unit size is small as compared to 1.5-ton ac of other brands so It doesn't circulate air in a wide area.

2. Indoor unit size is small as compared to 1.5-ton ac of other brands so It doesn't circulate air in a wide area.

I'm writing my review of LG 1.5-ton 3-star AC after using it for one month (In April which is not a peak hot time).

1. The cooling is very poor and inefficient. If you continue running the AC for more than 4 hours in Virat Mode, you won't be able to set the room temperature below 28 C.
2. Indoor unit size is small as compared to 1.5-ton ac of other brands so It doesn't circulate air in a wide area.

I have used Voltas and Hitachi in the past and they are much better than LG. Worst AC so I ...

Few things you need to consider if you are planning to buy this :

1. Size of the freezer is very small.

3. Due to the back pipes, you need an extra space hence be mindful if you are thinking to put in a small kitchen.
4. It's vegetable container is also quite small, suggest you to take a look at the fridge on some store before purchasing it online.

Otherwise fridge is good with silent operation.

2. Chiller size is unnecessary too big reducing available space overall of the fridge.
3. Due to the back pipes, you need an extra space hence be mindful if you are thinking to put in a small kitchen.
4. It's vegetable container is also quite small, suggest you to take a look at the fridge on some store before purchasing it online.

Otherwise fridge is good with silent operation.
